div.div: Summary of data and model performance statistics.
div.p: Nrec: number of occurrence; Habitat: Forest (FT) and Open-area vegetation (OAV); Guild: Frugivores (FR), Insectivores (IN), Nectarivores (NE), Others (OT); Status: Brazilian Endemic (ED), Near Threathened (NT), Vulnerable (VU), Endangered (EN), Critically Endangered (CR), *IUCN, ‡MMA, †SEMAS-PA; Model performance: ROC, TSS, Sensitivity, Specificity; Cutoff: threshold values maximized TSS for binarization; Variables importance: mean (sd) between runs; bold numbers represent mean values higher than 30% of importance.
